page.title: 20ASHDON 1985(cont.) CREDITS
page.content: FAMILIES BELONGING TO{LOCAL CLUBS, {SOCIETIES }OR OTHER{ORGANISATIONS.} (a) no membership. 68 (b)members of 1-3 organisations etc.65 (c)members 4 or more organisations. 12 FAMILIES USING{ENTERTAINMENT/SPORTING} FACILITIES IN (a)SAFFRON WALDEN. 50 (b)CAMBRIDGE 30 (C)HAVERHILL 48 NO. OF FAMILIES{SATISFIED}WITH THE ABOVE FACILITIES. 86 NO.ADULTS{ATTENDED VILLAGE SCHOOL.93} {CREDITS } This survey of our village was carried out by a small group of children from Ashdon County Primary school.Their names are;Stephanie Arnold,Julia Bartram,Anna Nelson,Emma Smith,Andrew Green,Catherine Tinney,Graham Arnold and James Reynolds.They were assisted by their headmaster,Mr.J.W.T.Butler and two local residents,Mrs.N.Homewood and Mrs.P.Bartram.
